overview: Walking the Santiago Road, from Braga in Portugal to Santiago de Compostela in Spain. A journey through History, memory and Identity. A walker, a smartphone and a long way ahead. Selected by the Tokyo Intl Short Film Festival (Honourable Mention) and the Japan Intl Film Festival (Honourable Mention), the Independent Film Festival of Cift (Best Short Award) and the Seul International Short Film Festival (Best Short Award) among others.
title: O Meu Caminho
